title: Trump Addresses the Nation on the Coronavirus Pandemic: A Closer Look | Daymond John
description:
Seth takes a closer look at President Trump’s address to the nation and the administration’s failed response to the coronavirus pandemic.

He also talks to Daymond John of "Shark Tank," who also takes a few more questions backstage.
